participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Resilient and determined, I have a strong work ethic and a passion for craftsmanship.
participant_1.background: I was the first born child. I escaped and later became a carpenter. I was a slave for 10 years. I got married 10 years later. My favorite color is red.

participant_2.name: Avery
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, I have a unique style and a love for all things tech and pop culture.
participant_2.background: My wardrobe is all band tees. I listen to techno music, exclusively. I go to multiple comic cons. I am an anime fan. My job involves building drones.
